response.original_title: Mozart: Die Entführung Aus dem Serail
response.overview: One of France's most celebrated young conductors, Marc Minkowski leads a world-class ensemble in this modernized production of Mozart's comedic three-act opera about the kidnapping and rescue of two women from a Turkish harem. Staged at the Aix-en-Provence Festival, the vibrant production features standout performances from sopranos Magali Léger and Malin Hartelius, tenors Loïc Félix and Matthias Klink, and bass Wojtek Smilek.
response.title: Mozart: Die Entführung Aus dem Serail
